nodes.text: Myarga, known as Myarga the Benevolent or Myarga the Merciless, was a cyborg Hutt female who represented the Hutt Cartel during the time of the High Republic Era. The Hutt was responsible for proposing a bargain with Kalo Sulman, the leader of a settlement on the planet Sedri Minor, that involved a Hutt trader transporting Vratixian barley from the planet. The Hutt arrived on Sedri Minor to take control of the planet while several Jedi were undertaking an investigation after finding the corpse of the trader on a derelict starship that had been attacked by the Nihil. Landing on Sedri in a Hutt Cartel vessel, the Hutt disembarked to announce the planet's takeover, flanked by Gamorreans atop rancors.
